body.name: ROVSUN 11LBS Portable Washing Machine, Electric Mini Twin Tub Washer with Spin Dryer, Washer(7LBS) and Spinner(4LBS), Great for Home Dorms Apartments RV Camping
features: 【Easy to Operate】Simple design of the operation panel, wash timer, wash options, drain options, and spin timer. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes and fill with water, then set the timer and start washing. Washer control timer runs for up to 15 minutes while the spin cycle timer runs for up to 5 minutes each load.

【Portable Capacity】The portable clothes washer has a total capacity of 11lbs (washer:7lbs, spinner:4lbs), ideal for smaller laundry loads. Perfect for washing various clothes, like T-shirt, baby clothes and towel etc. Featuring 1300RPM motor with a voltage frequency of 110V/60HZ, save your time and wash more clean!

【Upgrade Design】Plastic body ensures the machine will never be rust eaten. Blue transparent tub container window allows you to check your clothes anytime, conveniently and practically for daily life. What's more, stainless steel washing dewatering cylinder for its upgraded quality.

【No Installation】The portable washer machine makes it easy to start using it right out of the box. With a total weight of around 22 pounds, it can be easily moved and transported. Space-saving design for easy storage in apartments, dorms, RVs, bathroom or any other places.

【Less Noise and Eco-friendly】The volume level is average, definitely not silent but it's not obnoxiously loud like. Eco-friendly design, less water and detergent used which leads you for money saving. This is a perfect time/space/energy saving washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Me gusto mucho
reviews.reviewText: Muy buen material excelente lavada muy cómoda y pequeña

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans really well.
reviews.reviewText: This machine is amazing!!!!It cleans my clothes very very well and is compact, very low noise. No problems with it at all.I am happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tiny washer does the job <3
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Lets start with the cons and get those out of the way.-Shipping took a long time-Drain hose and power plug are really short.-Water inlet hose is way too small to fit any sink i'd know of.-Louder than i'd hoped.---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Now the PRO!-Small enough to fit in almost any space. *I use mine in my apartment bathroom*-Washer agitates really well if not over filled.-Spin Dryer is small but a god send vs wringing them out by hand.-Actually kinda stylish for a washer o.o-Drains well, washes well, spin dries well, well.... that's what I wanted <3-Easy to install and useFirst load I did was, 2 large towels, 2 adult shirts, 1 adult jeans, 6 socks, 1 kids jeans, 1 kids shirt, and 3 pairs of underwear. Ran it near 75% water for 15 minutes, drained, refilled with fresh water and ran for 5 minutes, drained and then began spin dry steps. Clothes turned out very clean <3I feel like the design could get better, not sure why it has to be separated for washing/spin dry but hey, for 120$ ish, I can just do a load of my kids and mine laundry once a day and skip the laundromat fees.I will update if it breaks within a year but it seems well built so hopefully not <3 Hope this review helps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as described...beware
reviews.reviewText: Not like description. Hose is so short to drain water and the hose to put on sink does not fit a standard airator. I don’t feel I should have to buy additional parts to make this thing work nor do I want to carry buckets of water to fill the tub multiple times for this price. Does not look durable as it’s Entirely made of plastic and does not sit flat on the floor. I will be returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Love this thing!!! I have a large family and I hate going to the basement to do laundry or to check up on whatever kid was supposed to be doing this. I got this for the upstairs bathroom. I can quickly wash things that are needed tomorrow morning (did I mention I have a large family :-) ), do my husbands dress clothes or simply catch up while getting other things done. We have a large closet in our bathroom that I turned into a drying closet. There is a rod in there and a dehumidifier. I can hang up a lot of clothes, make sure the dehumidifier is going and it doesn't take any longer to finish a regular load than it would in the standard washer/dryer downstairs. *Jeans and towels take 2-3 hours to dry after running through the spinner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hoes both need to be longer as well as cord
reviews.reviewText: I'm sure my neighbors don't like the noise of the spin

reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this. My first one didn't work. Contacted seller speedy response. Went over some trouble shooting method didn't work got a new one in the mail 4 days later. Awesome.
